newsitem.title: AUSTRALIA: RTRS-Australian bond yields drop to 2-1/2 yr lows.
newsitem.headline: RTRS-Australian bond yields drop to 2-1/2 yr lows.

text.p: Australian bonds yields dropped to their lowest level since March 1994 following news that Standard & Poor's had revised its outlook on Australia to positive from stable, traders said on Wednesday.
The September 10-year bond futures contract raced to 92.160 on the news and up from 92.060 at the lunchtime recess bringing the yield down to around 7.87 percent on the benchmark November 2006 bond.
"It's all on the back of S&P," one trader confirmed on the market's rally.
